page.title: 06Beckenham Tennis
page.content: {BECKENHAM TENNIS}is held at The Beckenham Cricket Club which was founded in 1865 and is sited in Foxgrove Road,Beckenham.In 1886 they organised their first major tennis tournament.Their centenary year is already being planned with royalty being invited to attend. The tournament is considered to be a major pre-Wimbledon championship as it is one of the few grass-court tournaments.In 1985 it was the only major tournament to be run by amateurs,under the backing of the Lawn Tennis Association and promoted by The Kentish Times Newspaper Group. The tennis week has attracted many world famous players such as B.Borg,A. Ashe,J.Connors,L. Hoad, B.J King and V.Wade.The mens singles attracted 64 competing for a prize of Â£2000 in 1985.Loal schools provide ball-boys .
